name: MagicBeachBall
description:
Roll using WASD

Move Camera with Mouse

Release Mouse with E or Esc

Pirate ships hide secrets.

Roll through the ship as a beach ball, get the key and find treasure!

Bugfix: Made clearer goals & fixed collision

Made for Mini Jam 108: Seaside

With azemazer, ch33s3 (Artstation, Itch), VERTIGO罰五
